name: GoForKids for iPhone
description:
Do you know how to play Go? Would you like to teach your kids the basic strategy of Go? Go For Kids is an iPhone app that teaches you concepts about Go by exploring 12 different challenges and testing your knowledge along the way.

- Master concepts of playing Go
- Play against the computer in a simplified version of Go called "First Capture Go".
- 4 different simple levels to play against
